channel.title: Music enabled client
channel.description:
[b]Location:[/b] http://dnd.no-ip.org/index.php [b]Arguments for usage:[/b] server, port [b] Example usage:[/b] http://dnd.no-ip.org/index.php?server=dnd.no-ip.org&port=43594
[b]"what is it?"[/b] a music enabled client runs directly off runescape cache, you can use packet 74 with it, if you have never used packet 74 before, take a look at this: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,166863.0.html
[b]"i get a load error, how do i fix"[/b]
1. make sure to use moparisthebest.com cache, if you have never ran the moparscape client just run it once the cache will save
2. my client is host specific it will not work downloaded, or on your site.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:117585”]Location: http://dnd.no-ip.org/index.php
Arguments for usage: server, port
Example usage: http://dnd.no-ip.org/index.php?server=dnd.no-ip.org&port=43594

“what is it?”
a music enabled client runs directly off runescape cache, you can use packet 74 with it, if you have never used packet 74 before, take a look at this: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,166863.0.html

“i get a load error, how do i fix”

  1. make sure to use moparisthebest.com cache, if you have never ran the moparscape client just run it once the cache will save

  2. my client is host specific it will not work downloaded, or on your site.[/quote]
